section.title: Making a Contribution
section.p: Lucene Java is always looking for contributions, especially in the areas of documentation. See the Wiki for details on contributing.

section.title: Clover Test Coverage Reports
section.p: Clover test coverage results are available here for the nightly build.

section.title: Hudson
section.p: Hudson is providing continuous integration capabilities to the Lucene project. It is responsible for running nightly builds, code coverage reports as well as building the nightly version of the website.

section.title: Nightly Build Download
section.p: Nightly builds are based on the trunk version of the code checked into SVN

section.title: Source Code
section.p: The source files are now stored using Subversion (see http://subversion.tigris.org/ and http://svnbook.red-bean.com/)
